sentences: Fumiya Sashida (指田 郁也, 指田 フミヤ, Sashida Fumiya, born 18 August 1986, in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese singer-songwriter.
Later on Sashida aimed to become a professional during his first year at high school, and started going to voice training.
In 2010 he applied to Warner Music Japan's Voice Power Audition: 100-nen Vocalist o Sagase and won the Grand Prix.
Sashida later started his major debut with the single "bird / Yūyake Kōzokudōro" in 12 October 2011.
